description: Tranquill, known as the Wild Pigeon Pok√©mon, is the evolved form of Pidove. It is believed that, deep within the forest where Tranquill live, there is a peaceful country without strife. Ash`s Pidove evolves into a Tranquill in Best Wishes! episode 22 "A Venipede Stampede!" after seeing Trip`s Tranquill in action. In episode 44, a flock of wild Tranquill appears, enraged at a Purrloin for stealing their berries.
name: Hatoboh
